Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.optics

Visualizers that do work on OPTICS plots

See:
          Description


Class Summary
AbstractOPTICSVisualization<D extends Distance<D>> Abstract base class for OPTICS visualizer
OPTICSClusterVisualization<D extends Distance<D>> Visualize the clusters and cluster hierarchy found by OPTICS on the OPTICS Plot.
OPTICSClusterVisualization.Factory Factory class for OPTICS plot selections.
OPTICSPlotCutVisualization<D extends Distance<D>> Visualizes a cut in an OPTICS Plot to select an Epsilon value and generate a new clustering result
OPTICSPlotCutVisualization.Factory Factory class
OPTICSPlotSelectionVisualization<D extends Distance<D>> Handle the marker in an OPTICS plot.
OPTICSPlotSelectionVisualization.Factory Factory class for OPTICS plot selections.
OPTICSPlotVisualizer<D extends Distance<D>> Visualize an OPTICS result by constructing an OPTICS plot for it.
OPTICSPlotVisualizer.Factory Factory class for OPTICS plot.
OPTICSSteepAreaVisualization<D extends Distance<D>> Visualize the steep areas found in an OPTICS plot
OPTICSSteepAreaVisualization.Factory Factory class for OPTICS plot selections.
 

Enum Summary
OPTICSPlotSelectionVisualization.Mode Input modes
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.optics Description

Visualizers that do work on OPTICS plots
